item.title: Do you have a small penis
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Relive classic internet sexual harrasment!

App.java

[code]import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JLabel;

public class App {
public App() {
JFrame myFrame = new JFrame(“Cybersexual Harrasment”);
JLabel myLabel = new JLabel(“Do you have a small penis?”);
MyJButton myButton = new MyJButton(myFrame);

	myLabel.setBounds(0, 0, 172, 32);
	myButton.setBounds(163, 0, 123, 32);
	
	myFrame.add(myButton);
	myFrame.add(myLabel);
	
	myFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(myFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
	myFrame.setSize(293, 65);
	myFrame.setResizable(false);
	myFrame.setVisible(true);
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
	new App();
}

}
[/code]

MyJButton.java

[code]import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
import java.awt.event.MouseListener;

import javax.swing.JButton;
import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;

public class MyJButton extends JButton implements MouseListener, ActionListener {
public MyJButton(JFrame parent) {
super(“No”);
_parent = parent;
addMouseListener(this);
addActionListener(this);
}

public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
	if(getText().equals("Yes")) {
		while (true) {
			JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(_parent, "AHAHAHAHA",
					"HAHAHAHAHHAH", JOptionPane.OK_OPTION);
		}
	} else {
		while (true) {
			JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(_parent, "Are you sure about that?",
					"Hhhm...", JOptionPane.YES_OPTION);
		}
	}
}

public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e) {
	setText("Yes");
}

public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e) {
	setText("No");
}

public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e) { }
public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e) { }

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent arg0) {
	if(getText().equals("No"))
		JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(_parent, "cheetar",
				"fgt", JOptionPane.YES_OPTION);
}

JFrame _parent;
private static final long serialVersionUID = -6926385559578809623L;

}
[/code]
